Detailed Description

This class implements the standard ground specifier for the grounded source action of a particle system.

Implements RompCollider.

Reimplemented in ChunkRompTerrainCollider.

float ChunkRompCollider::ground ( const Vector3 &  pos,
float  dropDistance,
bool  oneSided 
) [virtual]

This method returns the height of the ground under pos, doing only one-sided collisions tests.

Parameters:
pos The position from which to drop.
dropDistance The distance over which the drop is checked.
oneSided If true then only consider collisions where the collision triangle is pointing up.
Returns:
The height of the ground found. If no ground was found within the dropDistance from the position supplied, RompCollider::NO_GROUND_COLLISION is returned.

Implements RompCollider.
